About Utility Gods

Building developer-first tools and solutions with a focus on open source innovation and technical excellence.

OrangeGas CMS

A general-purpose CMS that empowers the way you create and manage content. Build collections, blogs, and rich text content with ease.

Learn more

Developer Tools

A suite of tools including QR Gods for QR code generation, PhotoShip for image processing, and gottem cli for development workflows.

Modern templates for Astro, SvelteKit, and SolidJS with Tailwind and best practices built-in.

FastAPI, Go Echo, and HTMX templates with modern stack integrations.

Full-Stack Starters

Complete setups with databases, authentication, and modern UI frameworks.
